name: iTechSmart IoT Fleet Management Platform
description: Comprehensive Industrial IoT platform for real-time fleet management, geospatial tracking, and sensor data analytics

features.name: Real-time Geospatial Fleet Tracking
features.description: Live GPS tracking with sub-meter accuracy for thousands of assets across global regions

features.name: Industrial IoT Sensor Integration
features.description: Multi-protocol sensor data ingestion (MQTT, LoRaWAN, Zigbee, CAN bus) for IIoT devices

features.name: Predictive Maintenance Analytics
features.description: AI-powered failure prediction with 95%+ accuracy using vibration, temperature, and performance data

features.name: Advanced Route Optimization
features.description: Multi-objective routing with traffic, weather, fuel consumption, and delivery windows optimization

features.name: Geospatial Heat Mapping & Analytics
features.description: Real-time density mapping, route analysis, and geographic performance visualization

features.name: Fleet Performance Dashboard
features.description: Comprehensive KPI dashboard with utilization, efficiency, and cost metrics

features.name: Multi-Protocol Edge Gateway
features.description: Industrial-grade edge computing with local data processing and offline capabilities

features.name: Asset Health Monitoring
features.description: Real-time asset health scoring with vibration analysis, temperature monitoring, and performance metrics

features.name: Telemetry Data Lake
features.description: Time-series database for billions of sensor readings with real-time analytics capabilities

features.name: Automated Alert System
features.description: Intelligent alerting with anomaly detection, threshold monitoring, and escalation workflows

features.name: Fuel & Energy Management
features.description: Real-time fuel consumption monitoring, energy efficiency analysis, and cost optimization

features.name: Compliance & Regulation Tracking
features.description: HOS, ELD, FMCSA, and international compliance monitoring with automated reporting

features.name: Driver Behavior Analytics
features.description: AI-powered driving pattern analysis with safety scoring and coaching recommendations

features.name: Warehouse Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with WMS, inventory systems, and loading dock management

features.name: Mobile Field Operations
features.description: Native mobile apps for drivers, technicians, and field managers with offline capabilities

features.name: Digital Twin Simulation
features.description: Fleet digital twin for what-if scenarios, capacity planning, and operational optimization
